title: Spice container
marks: inscription, in Hebrew, on lower lip
description: fish shaped; constructed with hinges so body is flexible; head is hinged; mouth hinged and lower lip has holes; glass eyes; has plexi mount
provenance: (Moriah Galleries, New York); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased 1979; Gift to the MIA in 2002.
creditline: Gift of Mickey and Harold Smith
